FileFormat.FormatName: Ogg Vorbis Codec Compressed Multimedia File
FileFormat.FormatDescription: Ogg is a open container format maintained by the Xiph.Org Foundation. Vorbis is a free and open-source software project headed by the Xiph.Org Foundation and produces an audio coding format and software reference encoder/decoder (codec) for lossy audio compression.

InternalSignature.SignatureName: Ogg Vorbis Codec Compressed Multimedia File
InternalSignature.SignatureNote: Ogg Page header: Capture pattern (“oggS”); stream structure revision (00h); flag: 1st page of a logical bitstream (02h); 23 bytes; page segment Identification header (“vorbis”; version (00000000h)
